title: "Experimental Depression Treatment Is Nearly 80% Effective in Controlled Study"
excerpt: "SAINT, a new intensive and individualized form of transcranial magnetic stimulation reduces symptoms of depression within days of treatment. 80% of the people administered SAINT reported remission from depression symptoms that lasted for months following treatment."
